name: MSServiceAccount
desc: Account details for accessing a streaming media service.

items.name: var serviceName: String
items.desc: The localized name of the streaming media service.

items.name: var accountName: String
items.desc: The user’s display name, email address, or other identifier in a streaming media service.

items.name: var authorizationTokenURL: URL?
items.desc: A URL the system can access to request an OAuth token for the user’s HomePod speakers.

items.name: var authorizationScope: String?
items.desc: A list of permissions for the token request.

items.name: var clientID: String?
items.desc: A user identifier for the token request.

items.name: var clientSecret: String?
items.desc: A string that authenticates the user’s setup request.

items.name: var configurationURL: URL?
items.desc: The path to access the configuration endpoint of your streaming media service for HomePod.
